item.title: video editor needed to create videos about NHL ice hockey for a youtube channel - Upwork
item.description:
do u have a passion for editing nhl ice hockey videos?

do you want to create videos of the highest possible quality and be part of a young and driven team? then we have the dream job for you!

we are looking for an experienced video editor with a demonstrable track record in editing videos about NHL ice hockey for our youtube channel.

requirements:
- ability to use multiple editing styles
- use of professional software (like adobe premiere pro/ final cut pro / davinci)
- ability to incorporate real interviews/footage
- frequently change and add music in line with the feel and flow of the story
- clear communication

job information:
- editing of 8-12 minutes.
- you will work closely with our video editing manager
- personal training to improve your skills
- 2 videos per week

budget:
- $20 per video
-  change to grow
- bonus structure for excellent work

benefits:
- unlimited earning potential
- bonus opportunities.



Posted On: June 17, 2024 13:03 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Motion Graphics
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Looking For A Long term VIDEO EDITOR For FINANCE Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We run a channel that focuses on sharing the latest news within the geo-economic/political space (most of our videos are on BRICS partnership, de-dollarisation & Chinese economy/latest news).

Our goal is to be uploading at least x3 vides per week, and this frequency will increase over time. Ideally, we want someone who has knowledge of economic/political space, and remains up to date on the latest news regularly. Of course as mentioned our budget is $15 per video.

Also must be able to communicate easily in English and get on a zoom call.

Here’s a google docs with the step by step instructions to how the content will be made:
(https://docs.google.com/document/d/1-ahKBdrcljCGhyMoxvi0f15YzfMvxJOqkXoYHV7W3xI/edit)
NOTE: GO OVER THIS DOCUMENT COMPLETELY! It's exactly how we want the videos to be made.


I know a lot of people just send proposals without reading the Job post, so be sure to put "Geo/VIDEO" in the beginning of your proposal or otherwise I will not be reading it.

Budget: $15
Posted On: June 17, 2024 13:02 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Looking For A Long term Video Editor For ECONOMY Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We run a channel that focuses on sharing the latest news relating to economy and politics e.g. BRICS, Chinese economy and de-dollarisation.


Our goal is to be uploading at least x3 vides per week, and this frequency will increase over time. Ideally, we want someone who has knowledge of economic/political space, and remains up to date on the latest news regularly. Of course as mentioned our budget is $15 per video, but happy to negotiate this based on your video editing experience and style. Our videos are generally 13 minutes long.

Also must be able to communicate easily in English and get on a zoom call.

Here’s a google docs with the step by step instructions to how the content will be made:

item.title: Video template - Upwork
item.description:
I want to copy the attached video for the introduction to my testimonial videos.

Many testimonies come on the screen (they move), then there is a zoom and then my video testimony begins. The zoom will be from the video that will then be seen larger.

Since I want variety and that the video in the middle will change depending on the testimony I want to highlight, I need the file to be delivered to me as a premiere project so I can edit the testimonials later.

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 17, 2024 12:57 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro

item.title: Virtual Assistant-Good with Video Editing,/Technical - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a virtual assistant who is very good at following directions and can figure out things on their own.

We are starting an education company in the sales space and are creating lots of content. We need someone who can edit videos every day and then post them for us.

We need people who do not outsource the work and are extremely diligent at checking their work. There should be no spelling errors.

I'm looking for someone who is good at critical thinking and process optimization.

Hourly Range: $4.00-$10.00

item.title: Short-form video editor who speaks FRENCH - Upwork
item.description:
Bonjour

On cherche un monteur vidéo qui puisse monter mes shorts pour Instagram.

Je voudrais 30 shorts par mois et chaque short est 2-5$ (dépendant de la durée et le style).

Montage simple, pas s'animations ouf, puisque mon audience est âgée.

Un style clean, pas trop de cut, juste enlever les blancs. Les B-Roll doivent être mis pour embellir la vidéo et la rendre plus dynamique. Ils peuvent aussi servir à illustrer un de mes propos.

Looms qui expliquent tout:

https://www.loom.com/share/121375ddc51640a9aa492b2595006fc9?focus_title=1&muted=1&from_recorder=1

https://www.loom.com/share/032ebd68ed2a4ed9984a8a72b0b91abf?sid=6cd07096-3ed4-41df-8a8e-9b3e13dd02d4

Video exemples:

https://www.instagram.com/p/C5lnhlxNRA2/
https://www.instagram.com/p/C5v6hmLtnb1/
https://www.instagram.com/p/C7wywJEtAun/
https://www.instagram.com/p/C66midqNu3i/
https://www.instagram.com/p/C4ixPO9t5n9/

Ecrivez "Olala" au debut de votre application comme ca je sais vous avez lu tout

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 17, 2024 12:32 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, French
Skills: Video Editing, French
Country: France
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Brand Style Editing - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can edit our movies to match our brand style. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing and be familiar with our brand guidelines. Attention to detail is crucial as you will be responsible for ensuring that the final edited videos align with our brand aesthetics. The main tasks will include trimming, cutting, and rearranging footage, adding transitions and effects, and optimizing the videos for different platforms. The videos will be a max of 30 - 45 seconds.
We will need someone for 5 movies.

    Skills required:
    - Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
    - Strong understanding of storytelling techniques and video composition
    - Knowledge of color grading and correction
    - Ability to follow brand guidelines and adapt editing style accordingly

This is a medium-sized project with an estimated duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level video editor who can efficiently work on multiple movies simultaneously and deliver high-quality edited videos within the given timeframe.

Budget: $15
Posted On: June 17, 2024 12:31 UTC
Category: Logo Design
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for B2B Focus Ads Campaign - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to join our team and help create engaging B2B focus ads for our ad campaigns. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing raw footage into high-quality videos that effectively convey our brand message. Your role will involve collaborating with our marketing team to understand the campaign objectives, selecting the best shots, and applying appropriate transitions, effects, and graphics to create compelling ads. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of B2B marketing and be proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro.

Skills required:
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Strong attention to detail and ability to work with tight deadlines
- Knowledge of B2B marketing strategies
- Creativity in storytelling and visualizing ideas

Size: Small
Duration: Under 1 month
Expertise: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $11.00-$33.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 12:30 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Skills: Video Commercial, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Country: Australia
click to apply
